description:
Kyokutei Bakin spent 28 years telling the epic tale of Nanso Satomi Hakkenden, which numbered a total of 106 volumes upon completion. But if you`re in a rush to get the broad strokes, here`s a summary for you that`ll take less than ten minutes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: They Might Be Cats, but It`s Still the Chronicles of the Eight Dog Warriors!
猫なのに, 里見八犬伝!
